Makes the input box the same width as the chat box.
The minimum value that input box width will possible become.

The maximum value that input box width will possible become.

NOTE: This is disabled if the minimum width is greater than the maximum.
Completely ignores the server's requests to delete a chat message.
Completely ignores the server's requests to reset the chat.
uselesstweaks.config.miscellaneous.hide_: Hides the recipe book from showing up in your inventory.
uselesstweaks.config.miscellaneous.no_re: Stops the recipe book from shifting your inventory towards the right when toggled
uselesstweaks.config.miscellaneous.hideO:
Hides the off hand slot from showing up in your inventory

WARNING: This can break with certain texture packs!
uselesstweaks.config.miscellaneous.hide_: Hides the status effects from showing in various places.
